availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of R. T. Anderson and Kora Anderson. Physician in Meade County. Surgeon in the 28th Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from August 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 405.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 194C.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Meade County, KY, p. 16 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1965, Film # 7020666, Meade County, September 9, 1945 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0390.
Find A Grave, "Dr. Turner Anderson (1842-1908)," Memorial # 92553684, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92553684/turner-anderson (accessed November 29, 2018).
